Re: Order in USA v. Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
From: James Petrucci
To: Ray Ormond

Attachments: TEXT.htm
Ok
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: Ray Ormond (b)(6)@bop.gov
Date: 8/21/19 12:04 (GMT-05:00)
To: James Petrucci (b)(6)@bop.gov
Subject: Re: Order in USA v. Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
>>> "Ray Ormond" 08/21/2019 12:04 >>>
Let's discuss first. We can talk later tonight. Thanks.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: James Petrucci (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)-@bop.gov
Date: 8/21/19 10:51 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Ray Ormond (b)(6)@bop.gov
Subject: Fwd: Order in USA v. Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
>>> "James Petrucci" 08/21/2019 10:51 >>>
FYI......myself and legal will most likely attend.
Page 1770
DOJ-OGR-00023656

-------- Original message --------
From: James Petrucci (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)-@bop.gov
Date: 8/21/19 10:51 AM (GMT-05:00)

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing a court order related to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are between James Petrucci and Ray Ormond, both of whom are associated with the Bureau of Prisons (BOP). The document has been redacted to remove certain information, indicated by (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C).
